name: Twisting Art
description:
Twisting Art

A beautiful handcrafted art collection has been ruined and you are the only one who can fix it. Time is ticking, and more than 100 works of art are waiting for your help. Rotate the pieces and discover the beauty behind the twisted mess.

Features:

  •  Colorful evocative art style. 
  •  Time is your enemy! Rotate the pieces quickly. 
  •  Over 100 works of art to restore to their greatness. 
  •  Cheerful music. 
  •  Easy mode with a more relaxed pace.
  •  Simple and engaging gameplay mechanics.
  • In game languages: English, Spanish.

We have implemented Easy Mode in response to the feedback of  our testers . Normal  Mode is not easy but it can be beaten. Try to beat the game in Normal Mode, we dare you! 

Get all the golden stars you need to solve all the puzzles. If you get stack in some of them and you have tried for at least a 100 times...joking ;) you can use Easy Mode for that particular puzzle and return to the more challenging Normal Mode. Or play the whole game on Easy Mode for a more relaxed experience. Enjoy it at you own pace!

Enjoy the puzzle solving with the game and extend the Twisting Art experience getting the Art Pack!

The 105 illustrations Art Pack

We have created over 100 digital illustrations which are the very puzzles of our game Twisting Art. Now you can get every single one of them, 105 colorful illustrations in high resolution and 300 ppi. 

We have created for you 2 versions of each one of the 105 illustrations. One version in full color and another version in outline only so you can easily use your own palette with it or making a coloring book for example. So you are getting 210 original illustrations!

They can be used to create anything your heart desires, even printing them. Let your creativity fly and use them to create games, books, art prints, stickers...

These are only some ideas:

Space Shooter Mockup made with pieces of the illustrations

Mug Mockup using an enlarged version of one of the illustrations

Art Print Mockup using one of the illustrations

Notebook Mockup using a different color palette on one of the illustrations
